title: Company Roles Attestation
description: This schema represents the claim set of an SD-JWT based Verifiable Credential for describing a natural person's roles in companies and the result of a board disqualification check.

subject.description: Subject attributes (subset of PID) used to identify the natural person.

given_name.description: Given name (first name) of the subject.

birthdate.description: Date of birth of the subject (YYYY-MM-DD).

board_history.description: List of company roles the subject holds or has held as registered in the KVK Handelsregister.

legal_person_name.description: Registered (statutory or trade) name of the company or legal entity.

legal_person_id.description: KVK registration number of the company.

function.description: Role/function of the subject within the company, as registered in the Handelsregister (e.g. 'Bestuurder', 'Commissaris').

start_date.description: Start date of the role (YYYY-MM-DD) or null if unknown.

end_date.description: End date of the role (YYYY-MM-DD) or null if the role is still active.

board_disqualification.description: Result of the board disqualification check: false = no active ban, true = an active board disqualification exists.

issuing_authority.description: Name of the issuer that issued the credential
